page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: from cattle shed built from local red sandstone into ugly pre-fabricated huts storing grain and the farmer's machinery.The equipment can cost a lot of money and often it will take the farmer a long time to pay it off.The average tractor costs about Â£20,000, an average harvester Â£40,000 and the tyres of the tractor can cost up to Â£500.So it is understandable that the farmer must find good shelter to protect his machinery from rust,caused by remaining outside. Poly-tun Growers are new to this area this year.They hire fields from local farmers for the intensive growing of salads and vegetables under polythene.This gives a 14 day start over crops grown in the open ground.All materials and labour are provided by the company.Crops are packed and distributed.
